definition: see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: Low-flow toilets can save a lot of water.
sentences.chinese: 节水厕所可以节省很多水。

sentences.english: Cooling water flows back to the heating bucket and saves water and energy.
sentences.chinese: 冷却水回入加热水桶内，节能节水。

sentences.english: I need a brochure for a water-engineering firm based in Nairobi, Kenya.
sentences.chinese: 我需要在内罗毕，肯尼亚的节水型工程公司的小册子。

sentences.english: The main water-used equipments and water-saving technologies thereof in automobile coatings are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了汽车涂装的主要用水设备及其节水技术。

sentences.english: Improving the water desalting efficient is also an important method to saving water.
sentences.chinese: 提高水分的淋洗脱盐效率也是节水的一个重要途径。

sentences.english: Washing and drying full loads is also more cost-effective in terms of power and water consumption.
sentences.chinese: 一次性洗好和烘干所有的衣服更加节能和节水。

sentences.english: The comprehensive water-saving project brings about a considerable direct economic value to Yangcheng Power Plant.
sentences.chinese: 综合节水项目为阳城电厂带来了可观的直接经济价值。

sentences.english: Water-saving of counter-flow wet cooling tower is the key of water-saving work for the thermal power plant.
sentences.chinese: 逆流湿式冷却塔的节水是火力发电厂节水工作的关键。

sentences.english: Water-saving of counter-flow wet cooling tower is the key of water-saving work for the thermal power plant.
sentences.chinese: 逆流湿式冷却塔的节水是火力发电厂节水工作的关键。

sentences.english: Low volume drip or micro irrigation is a water-saving technology that has come into its own in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 低量滴灌或微灌是节水技术，已在其近数年。

sentences.english: Set up water-saving high efficiency crop systems that adapt to water resource conditions.
sentences.chinese: 建立与水资源条件相适应的节水高效农作制度。

sentences.english: Energy efficient Central Air, Dual paned windows, water saving toilets and showers.
sentences.chinese: 高效节能的中央空调，双格窗口，节水马桶和淋浴。

sentences.english: Expedite Water Saving Tune-up, Push forward Reform and Promote Sustainable Development of the Irrigated area.
sentences.chinese: 狠抓节水改造积极推进改革促进灌区可持续发展。

sentences.english: The experiences of water saving irrigation and the main irrigation ways in agriculture were introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了北京郊区县几种典型节水灌溉方式。

sentences.english: The seep irrigation underground is a kind of water-saving irrigation technique.
sentences.chinese: 地下渗灌是一种节水效果十分显著的节水灌溉技术。

sentences.english: The seep irrigation underground is a kind of water-saving irrigation technique.
sentences.chinese: 地下渗灌是一种节水效果十分显著的节水灌溉技术。

definition: drip irrigation/to irrigate by drip feed
